changeSet.author: cnader
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO association (id, association_type) SELECT version.id, 3 FROM version ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `association_type` = `association_type`;
INSERT INTO association (id, association_type) SELECT systeme.id, 2 FROM systeme ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `association_type` = `association_type`;
INSERT INTO association (id, association_type) SELECT famille.id, 1 FROM famille ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `association_type` = `association_type`;
